column1:
"Certo! Per poterti aiutare a monitorare la tua pressione sanguigna, ti chiedo di fornirmi i valori della tua pressione sanguigna measured in the past month. This will allow me to provide you with more accurate and personalized advice. Please provide me with the following information:

1. Your current blood pressure reading (systolic and diastolic values)
2. Any changes in your blood pressure readings over the past month (e.g., if there have been any significant increases or decreases)

Once I have this information, I will be able to better assess your overall cardiovascular health and provide you with tailored recommendations for managing your blood pressure." "Certamente
column2: puoi inserire i dati della tua pressione sanguigna di questo mese. Assicurati di fornire letture accurate e specifica l'ora e la data di ogni misurazione per una valutazione pi√π precisa."
